description:
L'Oréal Men Expert Hydra Energetic Daily Moisturiser gives skin an instant energy boost and fights the 5 signs of fatigue: dark circles, tired features, loss of firmness, roughness and dullness.

L'Oréal Paris Men Expert Hydra Energetic 24H Anti-Fatigue Moisturiser is enriched with energising Guarana and Vitamin C to instantly energise and awaken tired skin. Its lightweight, non-greasy and cooling texture provides skin with 24 hours of lasting hydration and energy. 91% of men say skin looks instantly fresher.95% of men agree skin has a fresh healthy glow after just 4 weeks.**Instrumental test

Hydrates and energises tired skin for 24hrs

Fights dryness and tired features

Improves appearance of dark circles

Packed with Guarana and Vitamin C for the ultimate hit of energy

Delivers an instant healthy glow
name: L'oreal Men Expert Hydra Energetic 24 Hour Moisturiser 50mL
